name: 結華
text: Ｐたんってさー、部屋綺麗にしてる？
trans: P-tan, do you keep your room clean?

name: プロデューサー
text: いきなりどうしたんだ？

name: 結華
text:
いやね、三峰の部屋がそろそろグッズで埋まりそうでさー
こうすれば片付く！　みたいなの教えてほしいなって
trans: Mitsumine's room is getting swallowed up by all her merch, see. I wanted to know if you knew any like, life hacks! To help keep stuff neat.

name: プロデューサー
text: （部屋の片付けで悩んでいるのか……）
trans: (She wants to know how to de-clutter her room...)

text:
収納スペースを
ＤＩＹだ
trans:
You could make
some DIY storage
containers.

text:
コンテナ
借りるのはどうかな？
trans:
Why don't you
try renting a
storage unit?

text:
１度リセットして
みるのはどうだ？
trans:
Why don't you get
rid of all your
old stuff?

name: 結華
text:
流行りに乗っかるわけだね？　
確かに自分で棚とか作るの面白そう
trans: That do-it-yourself stuff is certainly in lately. And building some new shelves myself does seem fun.

name: 結華
text:
それに、もしハマったらガテン系アイドルとか？
新しい路線開拓しちゃうかもだよね！
trans: Plus, if I got really into it! I could become the first ever Wood-Working Idol? It'd completely revolutionize the market!

name: 結華
text:
あっ、割と現実的だった
でも秘密基地みたいでかっこいいかも……？
trans: Oh, that's a practical solution. And it'd be like having my own secret hideout, that's kinda cool?

name: 結華
text:
コンテナ毎に作品別に──……したら、
いくらかかるんだろ……？
trans: A separate storage unit for each type of merch... Wait, how much does one of those even cost per month?

name: 結華
text:
断捨離はお断りかな
今のグッズも厳選してるんだからね
trans: Paring down my collection isn't on the table. The merch I have now has been hand-selected.

name: 結華
text:
そもそもリセットできないから
こうして悩んでるんだよＰたん……
trans: Getting rid of stuff was never an option, P-tan! That's why I'm in this mess in the first place...

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans: (Uh-oh... I screwed up. I should have said something else...)
